title: PM updated on projects’ status under ‘Decade of Dams’ plan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 25 (APP): Chairman of the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) Lt. General (Retd) Muzammil Hussain Thursday met Prime Minister Imran Khan here.
During the meeting, the WAPDA chairman apprised the prime minister of progress on the construction of dams under the government’s ‘Decade of Dams’ plan.
The prime minister lauded the pace of work on the projects and called for the accomplishment of the projects within the stipulated time.
